name: Kalengo
overview:
Collective Market Intelligence. Smart Portfolio Investment.

What is Kalengo?

Kalengo, founded in 2008, is an innovative financial service startup. It enables self-directed investors better manage their portfolios with investment applications on a social platform, including: â— Socially-aware portfolio analysis tools â— Curated financial information collected, aggregated, and filtered from 10,000+ blogs and media sources â— Interactive financial data visualization

Easy to use and easy to understand, Kalengo succeeds in delivering the concept of portfolio diversification and optimization, risk-adjusted return combined with social network elements.

Who is Kalengo built for?

Kalengo is built for the novice and seasoned individual investors who are seeking to make better investment decisions with the help of professional-quality portfolio analysis tools and curated financial info.

Our team

Prior to starting Kalengo, our team of Wall Street veterans spent years on building FinPortfolio - “Online Investing Tools That Leap Light-Years Ahead” (Business Week) and “Best of the Web” (Forbes). All the financial tools raved about in the press are now part of Kalengo, the next generation of financial social network.

Kalengo’s core team has previously worked for major Wall Street firms, technology companies and Internet startups, including Goldman Sachs, Merrill Lynch, Bank of America, Citibank, and JP Morgan Chase. Bringing experience at bulge bracket firms and expertise in financial engineering, our management has formed a highly efficient team and successfully developed for mass investors a comprehensive suite of investment applications on a social network platform, which to date have been available only to investment professionals in the form of expensive software or services.

milestones.description: Zack Miller, the author of TradeStream Your Way to Profits, chatted with our Director of Marketing, Carol Chow
milestones.source_description: Kalengo: Investing with collective intelligence from the cloud

milestones.description: Barron's Contributing writer - Mike Hogan writes a review about Kalengo!
All Business's blogger Mirand Marquit writes a review about Kalengo!
milestones.source_description: Review: Kalengo Could Help You Manage Your Portfolio
